snippet: The Islamic State freed about 350 members of Iraq’s Yazidi minority on Saturday, delivering them to safety in the country’s northern Kurdish region.
abstract: Islamic State releases 350 members of Iraq's Yazidi minority, most of whom are elderly, disabled or sick.
lead_paragraph: The Islamic State freed about 350 members of Iraq’s Yazidi minority on Saturday, delivering them to safety in the country’s northern Kurdish region.

headline.main: Islamic State Frees 350 Elderly and Ailing Yazidis
headline.print_headline: Islamic State Frees 350 Elderly and Ailing Yazidis

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
